properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the XMLPreference (a Application or Document).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: The name of the default tag to use for new story elements. Note: Either specifies an existing tag or creates a new tag.
properties.name: defaultStoryTagName

properties.description: The color of the default story tag, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Notes: Valid only when default story tag name value creates a new tag. Does not update the color of an existing tag. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.
properties.name: defaultStoryTagColor

properties.description: The name of the default tag to use for new table elements. Note: Either specifies an existing tag or creates a new tag.
properties.name: defaultTableTagName

properties.description: The color of the default table tag, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Notes: Valid only when default table tag name value creates a new tag. Does not update the color of an existing tag. . Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.
properties.name: defaultTableTagColor

properties.description: The name of the default tag to use for new table cell elements. Note: Either specifies an existing tag or creates a new tag.
properties.name: defaultCellTagName

properties.description: The color of the default cell tag, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Note: Valid only when default cell tag name value creates a new tag. Does not update the color of an existing tag. . Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.
properties.name: defaultCellTagColor

properties.description: The default name for new image elements created automatically.
properties.name: defaultImageTagName

properties.description: The color to give a new image tag, specified either as an array of three doubles, each in the range 0 to 255 and representing R, G, and B values, or as a UI color. Note: Used only when the tag needs to be created. Can return: Array of 3 Reals (0 - 255) or UIColors enumerator.
properties.name: defaultImageTagColor

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the XMLPreference.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
